snippet.title: DRAGON BALL Xenoverse 2 - FUTURE SAGA Chapter 2 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Who will confront the God of Destruction? 

Fu's plan moves on to the next stage in the second chapter of the #DBXV2 FUTURE SAGA DLC, coming soon!
